description:
A comfier seat means more riding, and that is always a good thing. Ergon has teamed up with the Canyon//SRAM-Racing-Team to create an incredibly supportive and comfortable women’s saddle. With feedback from professional female riders, The SR Sport Gel saddle has been fine tuned to perfection.

  • Ergonomic design reduces pressure on sensitive areas and is the result of extensive testing, prototyping and science (X-rays and CT scans)
  • Tapered cutout has been fine tuned with rider feedback to enhance comfort exactly where women need it
  • OrthoCell® foam is specifically designed for supporting joints, making it durable and comfortable for long rides
  • Ramped tail encourages a comfortable riding position, especially during seated acceleration and while in the drops
  • Wings add needed support to sit bones
  • Designed for sit bones that are 12-16cm apart
  • Maximum load 119kg (264lbs)
name: Ergon SR Sport Gel Saddle - Women's
